```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#TODO normalize by EGFP expression before comparing
RE_PTEN_KO <- read.csv("results/RE_DESeq2/RE_PTEN_KO.csv") %>% 
    mutate(type = "RE_PTEN_KO")
RE_WT <- read.csv("results/RE_DESeq2/RE_WT.csv") %>% 
    mutate(type = "RE_WT")

RE_PTEN_KO$RE_GFP <- RE_PTEN_KO$log2FoldChange / (RE_PTEN_KO %>% filter(X == "EGFP") %>% .[, "log2FoldChange"])
RE_WT$RE_GFP <- RE_WT$log2FoldChange / (RE_WT %>% filter(X == "EGFP") %>% .[, "log2FoldChange"])
```

```{r}
rbind(RE_PTEN_KO, RE_WT) %>% 
    ggplot() +
        geom_histogram(aes(x = RE_GFP), bins = 30) +
        facet_wrap(~type)
ggsave("figures/RE_EGFP.png")
```

```{r}
ks.test(RE_PTEN_KO$RE_GFP, RE_WT$RE_GFP)
```
